name: Friend-Ship
description:
Friend-Ship

{Story}

Once upon a time, there was a great captain who sailed the seas with his loyal crew. They faced many challenges and conquered countless obstacles, but one day, they were lost at sea and all hope seemed lost.

As they drifted on the waves, a pitiful witch appeared before them, and without mercy, she ambushed the ship. The witch killed the captain's crew, leaving him stranded on a desolate island.

With no one to turn to and no hope left, the captain wandered aimlessly on the island until he stumbled upon a mysterious amulet. To his surprise, the amulet contained the soul of his first mate, who had been lost at sea many years ago.

Together, the captain and his ghostly first mate set out to find the witch's amulet, which contains the rest of the captain's crew...

{Controls}

WASD to move the captain

Arrow keys to move the first mate

Left Shift to interact, shoot, and dig as the captain

Right Shift to interact with the ghost

Friend-Ship is more fun with friends! Find one and go on your journey TOGETHER!!
